remarks: A function continuous with respect to the standard topology, is a real mapping.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
fcnre.1 $e |- K = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
fcnre.3 $e |- T = U. J $.
sfcnre.5 $e |- C = ( J Cn K ) $.
fcnre.6 $e |- ( ph -> F e. C ) $.
fcnre $p |- ( ph -> F : T --> RR ) $.
